# School Bonus Application - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
This is a mobile application for awarding bonuses (algocoins) to school students.

## Technology Stack
- Next.js
- React
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS

## Project Status
✅ Copilot instructions created
⏳ Scaffolding Next.js project
⏳ Creating authentication page
⏳ Creating profile page

## Requirements
- Admin login is fixed as "admin" (non-editable field)
- Email validation: xxx@xxx.xx format
- Password change requires matching "new password" and "repeat new password"
- Error messages in Russian
- Profile page allows email editing
